name: User tries to refuel using One-Touch flow with purchase limit greater than the default BU setting
description: User tries to refuel using One-Touch flow with purchase limit greater than the default BU setting
descriptionHtml: User tries to refuel using One-Touch flow with purchase limit greater than the default BU setting

steps.name: I make api request to store id "0" with plate ""

testStage.description: User tries to refuel using One-Touch flow with purchase limit greater than the default BU setting

steps.name: I check that the Saucelabs session is preserved

parameters.name: userProfile
parameters.value: {PHONE_NUMBER=781781000, FIRST_NAME=Janina, PASSWORD=#Test123, EMAIL=janina.kowalska@gmaptest.com, PHONE_COUNTRY_PREFIX=+48, PHONE_COUNTRY=Poland, OTP=000000, LAST_NAME=Kowalska, BUSINESS_UNIT=DK}

steps.name: I skip linking my card
I check if Confirm Button from previous fuelling is displayed
I return to the "Home Screen"
I accept Updated Terms and Conditions
I close "Tell Us What You Think Pane"
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I close "Tell Us What You Think Pane"
I mock the location of the device to "SWEDEN_20888"
I click on "ACCOUNT" button
I check that the "Account Screen" is displayed
I check that the "Profile" tab is displayed
I click on "BUILD NUMBER" tab
I click on "SET LOCATION" button
I enter the location data of the "SWEDEN_20888" station
I check "Set Location" page is visible
I enter the site ID "SWEDEN_20888" in the input
I click on "SET LOCATION" button
I click on "Car Wash" advertisement
I check if "Car Wash" advertisement is displayed
I close and open application
I make sure that the location is set correctly
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I click on "ACCOUNT" button
I check that the "Account Screen" is displayed
I click on "PREFERENCES" tab
I check that the "Preferences Screen" is displayed
I click on "FUEL PREFERENCES" button
I check that the "Fuel Preferences Screen" is displayed
I click on "CHANGE" button
I check that the "Fuel Purchase Limit Screen" is displayed
I clear the text in "PURCHASE LIMIT" input
I enter the new purchase limit "950" in the input
I click on "SAVE" button
I check that the "Fuel Preferences Screen" is displayed
I check that the "Purchase limit was changed" toast message is displayed
I click on "BACK" button
I check that the "Preferences Screen" is displayed
I click on "BACK" button
I check that the "Account Screen" is displayed
I click on "HOME" button
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I make sure that the "BUY FUEL" tab is in the default state
I make an API call to "PBP Camera Webhook" with following information: [Store: 10888, Pump: 3, Plate: dk17xi7j, Region: dk]
I make api request to store id "10888" with plate "dk17xi7j"
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I move the application to the background for "30" seconds
I check that the "Confirm Fueling Pane" is displayed
I wait for "Confirm fueling Pane" to be displayed after moving app to the background
I click on "CONFIRM" button on bottom pane
I check if the progress bar on the "BUY FUEL" tab is advancing
I swipe on the device screen to the to refresh Home Page
I close "Tell Us What You Think Pane"
I click on "TRANSACTION HISTORY" button
I check that the "Activity History Screen" is displayed
I close "Tell Us What You Think Pane" on Activity History page
I get the text from the "1"st/nd/rd/th activity history "DATE" element
I check that the application text: "Mar 28, 2025" is equals to expected value: "Mar 28, 2025"
I get the text from the "1"st/nd/rd/th activity history "TAGS" element
I check that the application text: "Fuel" is equals to expected value: "Fuel"
I get the text from the "1"st/nd/rd/th activity history "PRICE" element
I check that the actual value: "949.99" is close to value "950.0" with margin "1.0"
I click on "1"st/nd/rd/th activity history element
I check that the "Activity History Details Screen" is displayed
I get the text from the "TOTAL" text
I check that the actual value: "949.99" is close to value "950.0" with margin "1.0"
I get the text from the "TOTAL" text
I check that the application text: "DKK" is equals to expected value: "DKK"
I get the text from the "DATE" text
I check that the application text: "Mar 28, 2025" is equals to expected value: "Mar 28, 2025"
I get the text from the "ORDER ID" text
I check that the application text: "AAJA10888250328121341049052" isn't empty
I get the text from the "PAYMENT METHOD" text
I check that the application text: "4444" is equals to expected value: "4444"

labels.name: parentSuite
labels.value: GMAP EU Mobile Test Automation - [ANDROID PARALLEL XML SUITE]

items.statusDetails:
Test '[PBP] User tries to refuel using One-Touch flow with purchase limit greater than the default BU setting' failed due to configuration error!
Error details
Could not start a new session. Response code 500. Message: 

Status Code: 500 - Error while starting appium session: An unknown server-side error occurred while processing the command. Original error: Cannot start the 'com.circlek.gmap.eu.staging' application. Consider checking the driver's troubleshooting documentation. Original error: 'com.circlek.gmap.MainActivity' or 'com.circlek.gmap.eu.staging.com.circlek.gmap.MainActivity' never started. Consider checking the driver's troubleshooting documentation.
